scripts.postinstall: ngcc --properties es2015 browser module main && node ./decorate-angular-cli.js
scripts.bindings:codex: cd apps/codex-functions/src/ && func extensions install && dotnet build extensions.csproj -o bin --no-incremental

scripts.deploy:codex: az functionapp deployment source config-zip -g wrdsb-codex -n wrdsb-codex --src ./dist/codex-functions.zip
